Sentencas: One of the main challenges in today's solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technology is the reduction of their operating temperature.
Titulo: The properties of samarium doped ceria oxide thin films grown by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: New types of oxygen ion conducting materials are currently under investigation to overcome the problems which SOFC faces at high temperatures.
Titulo: The properties of samarium doped ceria oxide thin films grown by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: Samarium doped ceria oxide (SDC) was the material of investigation in this work.
Titulo: The properties of samarium doped ceria oxide thin films grown by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: Optical quartz (SiO2) and Fe-Ni-Cr alloy (Alloy 600) were the two types of chosen substrates onto which SDC thin films were deposited by e-beam evaporation technique.
Titulo: The properties of samarium doped ceria oxide thin films grown by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: The bias voltage was applied to the substrate during film growth.
Titulo: The properties of samarium doped ceria oxide thin films grown by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: It had an influence on film formation, its microstructure and density because of the ionized particles presence in the SDC vapor stream.
Titulo: The properties of samarium doped ceria oxide thin films grown by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: Changes in crystallite size and surface morphology were determined from X-ray diffraction data and scanning electron microscopy images.
Titulo: The properties of samarium doped ceria oxide thin films grown by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: Influence of bias voltage on porosity of formed SDC thin films on optical quartz were calculated from transmittance spectra data by using Swanepoel method.
Titulo: The properties of samarium doped ceria oxide thin films grown by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: The porosity decreases up to 12% by decreasing bias voltage from 0 to - 150 V. (C) 2009
